## lib-ethers package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BlockPolledGivetyStore](./lib-ethers.blockpolledgivetystore.md) | Ethers-based [GivetyStore](./lib-base.givetystore.md) that updates state whenever there's a new block. |
|  [EthersGivety](./lib-ethers.ethersgivety.md) | Convenience class that combines multiple interfaces of the library in one object. |
|  [EthersTransactionCancelledError](./lib-ethers.etherstransactioncancellederror.md) | Thrown when a transaction is cancelled or replaced by a different transaction. |
|  [EthersTransactionFailedError](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionfailederror.md) | Thrown by [EthersGivety](./lib-ethers.ethersgivety.md) in case of transaction failure. |
|  [PopulatableEthersGivety](./lib-ethers.populatableethersgivety.md) | Ethers-based implementation of [PopulatableGivety](./lib-base.populatablegivety.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [PopulatedEthersGivetyTransaction](./lib-ethers.populatedethersgivetytransaction.md) | A transaction that has been prepared for sending. |
|  [PopulatedEthersRedemption](./lib-ethers.populatedethersredemption.md) | A redemption transaction that has been prepared for sending. |
|  [ReadableEthersGivety](./lib-ethers.readableethersgivety.md) | Ethers-based implementation of [ReadableGivety](./lib-base.readablegivety.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [SendableEthersGivety](./lib-ethers.sendableethersgivety.md) | Ethers-based implementation of [SendableGivety](./lib-base.sendablegivety.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [SentEthersGivetyTransaction](./lib-ethers.sentethersgivetytransaction.md) | A transaction that has already been sent. |
|  [UnsupportedNetworkError](./lib-ethers.unsupportednetworkerror.md) | Thrown when trying to connect to a network where Givety is not deployed. |

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BlockPolledGivetyStoreExtraState](./lib-ethers.blockpolledgivetystoreextrastate.md) | Extra state added to [GivetyStoreState](./lib-base.givetystorestate.md) by [BlockPolledGivetyStore](./lib-ethers.blockpolledgivetystore.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [BorrowingOperationOptionalParams](./lib-ethers.borrowingoperationoptionalparams.md) | Optional parameters of a transaction that borrows GUSD. |
|  [EthersCallOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherscalloverrides.md) | Optional parameters taken by [ReadableEthersGivety](./lib-ethers.readableethersgivety.md) functions. |
|  [EthersGivetyConnection](./lib-ethers.ethersgivetyconnection.md) | Information about a connection to the Givety protocol. |
|  [EthersGivetyConnectionOptionalParams](./lib-ethers.ethersgivetyconnectionoptionalparams.md) | Optional parameters of [ReadableEthersGivety.connect()](./lib-ethers.readableethersgivety.connect_1.md) and [EthersGivety.connect()](./lib-ethers.ethersgivety.connect_1.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [EthersGivetyWithStore](./lib-ethers.ethersgivetywithstore.md) | Variant of [EthersGivety](./lib-ethers.ethersgivety.md) that exposes a [GivetyStore](./lib-base.givetystore.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [EthersTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md) | Optional parameters taken by [EthersGivety](./lib-ethers.ethersgivety.md) transaction functions. |
|  [ReadableEthersGivetyWithStore](./lib-ethers.readableethersgivetywithstore.md) | Variant of [ReadableEthersGivety](./lib-ethers.readableethersgivety.md) that exposes a [GivetyStore](./lib-base.givetystore.md)<!-- -->. |
